name: Word Finder
description:
The aim of the word finder game is to find all hidden words.  With this game you can easily improve your vocabulary,  concentration and spelling skills.  Do you enjoy the word games? Do you like challenge?  Here comes the perfect game for you! Word Finder is classic word game. Embrace your brain power to discover words.

Play Word Finder Game and learn more than thousands of words in English.

3 letter words
4 letter words
5 letter words
6 letter words
7 letter words
8 letter words

Six levels, select your level and start playing.
Discover hidden words from mixed letters.
Find words and develop your brain & vocabulary skills.
Simple and Easy!
Great exercise for the brain
Support both Phones and Tablets.
Easy choosing letters.
Letters grid adjusts automatically to your device. Clean colorful look.
Concentrate to find all hidden words in given letters.  
Find as many words as possible.

When you start the game the count down timer will also start from 9 seconds to 1 second.  Just the click the correct word button and get your points.  If you press the correct word button when the time is 8 seconds you get 8 points, if you press the correct word button when the time is 7 seconds you get 7 points and so on.  There is no deduction in points when click the wrong word button.  You always gain points and do not loose any points and the game at any level.

Difficulty increases along with levels. Easy to play, but hard to beat! Feel achievement with increased leaves.  

Applicable to all Ages!  This is a perfect game for word fans.  Play the game now, you will find it so addictive and just can't put your phone down.  Search and find all the words hidden in the grid. In this  word finder you can choose between six difficulty level,  All puzzles are automatically generated by the app for endless fun.  Having a fun by playing addictive levels as discovering brand-new words!  

The aim of the game is to find all hidden words.  With this game you can easily improve your vocabulary, concentration and spelling skills.  It starts out very easy but gets challenging quickly. It even challenges the real word expert! You will have fun sharping your mind and improving your spelling skills.

Lots of achievements. Solve as many words to achieve them!  Be an excellent word finder!  How many words do you know? How fun a word game could be?  Then just play this newly designed word finder!  Super fun and for all ages!  Just play word
finder with friends and families.

Best word game for people looking for brain challenging word games or stimulating word finder games.  A new educational game for all ages that will improve your English spelling skills in an entertaining and challenging way!
